availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Absalom W. Siria (farmer, hopkins county, ky, green county, indiana, and woodson co. kansas)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. Indiana native. Son of David Siria and Dorcas Siria. Farmer in Greene County, Indiana, in 1850. Farmer in Woodson County, Kansas Territoty, in 1860. Farmer in Madisonville, Kentucky, in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Indiana, Greene County, Wright, p. 368A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kansas Territory, Woodson County, Liberty, p. 825.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Hopkins County, KY, September 1862, p. 57.
"Absalom Whiliker Siria (1835-1908)," Find A Grave, Memorial #63416105, accessed September 29, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/63416105.
